part1And2

类 prisonerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • part1And2.prisonerClient

  • class prisonerClient
extends java.lang.Object
    作者:
    Yuhong Chen The client class. Runs RMI of the prosecuterService object.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      (专用程序包) static prosecutor lookForProsecuterService()
      look up the registry and return the prosecuterService object, so its method can be used in this client class.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main method.
      (专用程序包) static void startGame()
      print instruction of the game, prompt for input and display the sentence.
      (专用程序包) static void testConnection()
      Remote call of testConnection method.

    • 方法详细资料

      • lookForProsecuterService

        static prosecutor lookForProsecuterService()
        look up the registry and return the prosecuterService object, so its method can be used in this client class.
        返回:
        the prosecuterService object

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main method. first test connection with the server and start the game.
        参数:
        args -

      • startGame

        static void startGame()
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        print instruction of the game, prompt for input and display the sentence.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • testConnection

        static void testConnection()
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remote call of testConnection method.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
